



0 = 0x77 = 0111 0111
1 = 0x24 = 0010 0100
2 = 0x5D = 0101 1101
3 = 0x6D = 0110 1101
4 = 0x2E = 0010 1110
5 = 0x6B = 0110 1011
6 = 0x7B = 0111 1011
7 = 0x25 = 0010 0101
8 = 0x7F = 0111 1111
9 = 0x6F = 0110 1111
A = 0x3F = 0011 1111
B = 0x3A = 0011 1010
C = 0x53 = 0101 0011
D = 0x7C = 0111 1100
E = 0x5B = 0101 1011
F = 0x1B = 0001 1011
